description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

url.description: An absolute URL that is used to identify this expansion profile when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this expansion profile is (or will be) published.

identifier.description: Formal identifier that is used to identify this expansion profile when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

version.description: Used to identify this version of the expansion profile when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance.

name.description: A free text natural language name for the expansion profile.

status.description: The status of the expansion profile.

experimental.description: This expansion profile was authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended for genuine production usage.

publisher.description: The name of the individual or organization that published the expansion profile.

contact.description: Contacts to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

date.description: The date that the expansion profile status was last changed. The date must change when the business version changes, if it does, and it must change if the status code changes.

description.description: A free text natural language description of the use of the expansion profile - reason for definition,  conditions of use, etc. The description may include a list of expected usages for the expansion profile and can also describe the approach taken to build the expansion profile.

codeSystem.description: A set of criteria that provide the constraints imposed on the value set expansion by including or excluding codes from specific code systems (or versions).

includeDesignations.description: Controls whether concept designations are to be included or excluded in value set expansions.

designation.description: A set of criteria that provide the constraints imposed on the value set expansion by including or excluding designations.

includeDefinition.description: Controls whether the value set definition is included or excluded in value set expansions.

includeInactive.description: Controls whether inactive concepts are included or excluded in value set expansions.

excludeNested.description: Controls whether or not the value set expansion includes nested codes (i.e. ValueSet.expansion.contains.contains).

excludeNotForUI.description: Controls whether or not the value set expansion includes codes which cannot be displayed in user interfaces.

excludePostCoordinated.description: Controls whether or not the value set expansion includes post coordinated codes.

displayLanguage.description: Specifies the language to be used for description in the expansions i.e. the language to be used for ValueSet.expansion.contains.display.

limitedExpansion.description: If the value set being expanded is incomplete (because it is too big to expand), return a limited expansion (a subset) with an indicator that expansion is incomplete.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

name.description: The name of an individual to contact regarding the expansion profile.

telecom.description: Contact details for individual (if a name was provided) or the publisher.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

include.description: Code systems to be included in value set expansions.

exclude.description: Code systems to be excluded from value set expansions.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

codeSystem.description: A data group for each code system to be included.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

system.description: An absolute URI which is the code system to be included.

version.description: The version of the code system from which codes in the expansion should be included.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

codeSystem.description: A data group for each code system to be excluded.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

system.description: An absolute URI which is the code system to be excluded.

version.description: The version of the code system from which codes in the expansion should be excluded.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.
Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

designation.description: A data group for each designation to be included.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

language.description: The language this designation is defined for.

use.description: Designation uses for inclusion in the expansion.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

designation.description: A data group for each designation to be excluded.

allOf.description: Resource to define constraints on the Expansion of a FHIR ValueSet.

language.description: The language this designation is defined for.

use.description: Designation uses for exclusion in the expansion.
